metadata.description: A valid Log Analytics workspace name (to add the Solution to your Workspace); or provide a neme for a new OMS Workspace to be created for you.
Region of the Log Analytics workspace
Service Tier: Free, Standalone, or PerNode

customSolution.name: SCOM ACS Dashboards
customSolution.description: This is a pre-built solution for Microsoft OMS (www.microsoft.com/oms).This solution was built from following Wei Ho Lim's 2 articles. This solution requires the OMS Security and Audit solution to be enabled first, as it leverages this collected data.
customSolution.author: Adin.Ermie@outlook.com

Header.Label: Mapping ACS Reports to OMS Search Queries

List.Title: Summary
List.Content:
This post features a table that shows the mapping between Audit Collection Services (ACS) SSRS reports and search queries used in OMS Log Analytics. 

Most of the OMS search queries listed in this post are used to drive the views in this ACS Dashboard in OMS Log Analytics.

queries.query: All Events For Specified Computer grouped by Activity
queries.displayName: All Events For Specified Computer grouped by Activity

queries.query: Type=SecurityEvent Account="<<User Domain\\Account Name>>" | measure count() by Activity
queries.displayName: All Events For Specified User grouped by Activity

queries.query: Type=SecurityEvent Account="<<User Domain\\Account Name>>" | measure count() by Activity
queries.displayName: All Events With Specified Event ID

queries.query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID="<<Event Id>>" | measure count() by Computer
queries.displayName: All Events With Specified Event ID grouped by Computer

queries.query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID="<<Event Id>>" | measure count() by Account
queries.displayName: All Events With Specified Event ID grouped by Account

General.title: PLANNING: Event Counts and Hourly Distribution

LineChart.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 | measure count() AS Count by TimeGenerated Interval 1Hour

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 | measure count() AS Count by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 | measure count() AS Count by Computer

General.title: Planning: Logon Counts of Privilege Users

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 AND SubjectDomainName!="NT AUTHORITY" AND AccountType!="Machine"

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 AND SubjectDomainName!=”NT AUTHORITY” AND AccountType!=”Machine” | Measure Count() by SubjectAccount
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 AND SubjectDomainName!=”NT AUTHORITY” AND AccountType!=”Machine” | Select SubjectAccount, PrivilegeList

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=516 OR EventID=4612 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=517 OR EventID=1102 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=517 OR EventID=1102 | measure count() AS EventPerHour interval 1Hour
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=517 OR EventID=516 OR EventID=1102 OR EventID=4612 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=539 OR EventID=644 OR EventID=4740 OR EventID=6279

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[529..537] OR EventID=539 OR (EventID=4625 AND Status=0xc000006d)  | Select TargetAccount, IpAddress, Computer, LogonProcessName, AuthenticationPackageName, LogonTypeName

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[529..537] OR EventID=539 OR (EventID=4625 AND Status=0xc000006d) | measure count() by TargetAccount
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=624 OR EventID=4720 OR EventID=630 OR EventID=4726 | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, Activity, Computer

General.title: Account Management: User Accounts Created Or Deleted

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=624 OR EventID=4720) | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS CreatedBy | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, CreatedBy, Computer

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=630 OR EventID=4726) | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS DeletedBy | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, DeletedBy, Computer

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=624 OR EventID=4720 OR EventID=630 OR EventID=4726 | Measure Count() by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=539 OR EventID=644 OR EventID=4740 OR EventID=6279

General.title: Account Management: Domain and Built-in Administrators Membership Changes

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4728 OR EventID=4732 OR EventID=4756 OR EventID=632 OR EventID=636 OR EventID=660 AND (“*512” OR “S-1-5-32-544”) | Extend "Add Member" AS Action | Select Action, TargetUserName, Activity, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated, Computer

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4729 OR EventID=4733 OR EventID=4757 OR EventID=633 OR EventID=637 OR EventID=661 AND (“*512” OR “S-1-5-32-544”)  Extend "Remove Member" AS Action | Select Action, TargetUserName, Activity, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated, Computer

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[4728..4729] OR EventID:[4732..4733] OR EventID:[4756..4757] OR EventID:[632..633] OR EventID:[636..637] OR EventID:[660..661] AND (“*512” OR “S-1-5-32-544”) | measure Count() by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[4728..4729] OR EventID:[4732..4733] OR EventID:[4756..4757] OR EventID:[632..633] OR EventID:[636..637] OR EventID:[660..661] AND ("*512" OR "S-1-5-32-544") | Select TargetUserName, Activity, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated, Computer

General.title: Account Management: Password Change Attempts by Non-Owner

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" TargetAccount NOT IN {Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" | measure count() by SubjectAccount}

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" TargetAccount NOT IN {Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" | measure count() by SubjectAccount} | Measure Count() by SubjectAccount
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!=”ANONYMOUS LOGON” TargetAccount NOT IN {Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!=”ANONYMOUS LOGON” | measure count() by SubjectAccount} | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS ChangedBy | Select  TimeGenerated, Computer, TargetAccount, ChangedBy

General.title: Policy: Account and Audit Policy Changed

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=643 OR EventID=4739 | Select Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated, EventData

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=612 OR EventID=4719 | Select Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated, EventData

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=612 OR EventID=643 OR EventID=4719 OR EventID=4739 | measure count() by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=612 OR EventID=643 OR EventID=4719 OR EventID=4739 | Select Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated, EventData

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4670 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, EventData

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4670 | measure count() by Computer
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4670 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, EventData

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[608..609] OR EventID:[621..622] OR EventID:[4704..4705] | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, EventData

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[608..609] OR EventID:[621..622] OR EventID:[4704..4705] | measure count() by Computer
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[608..609] OR EventID:[621..622] OR EventID:[4704..4705] | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, EventData

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=528 OR EventID=540 OR EventID=4624 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, IpAddress, AuthenticationPackageName, LogonProcessName, LogonTypeName, TargetAccount

SecondTile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 | Select TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, SubjectAccount, PrivilegeList

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 OR EventID=528 OR EventID=540 OR EventID=4624 | measure count() by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 OR EventID=528 OR EventID=540 OR EventID=4624

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[4727..4735] OR EventID=4737 OR EventID:[4754..4758] OR EventID:[631..639] OR EventID=641 OR EventID:[658..662] | EXTEND TargetUserName As GroupName | Select Activity, GroupName, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[4727..4735] OR EventID=4737 OR EventID:[4754..4758] OR EventID:[631..639] OR EventID=641 OR EventID:[658..662] | measure count() by Activity
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[4727..4735] OR EventID=4737 OR EventID:[4754..4758] OR EventID:[631..639] OR EventID=641 OR EventID:[658..662] | EXTEND TargetUserName As GroupName | Select Activity, GroupName, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated

Tile.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=560 OR EventID=567 OR EventID=4656 OR EventID=4663 | Select Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated, EventData
Tile.Legend: All Object Access Related Audit Event

List.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=560 OR EventID=567 OR EventID=4656 OR EventID=4663 | measure count() AS EventPerHour interval 1Hour | sort TimeGenerated desc
List.NavigationQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=560 OR EventID=567 OR EventID=4656 OR EventID=4663 | Select Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated, EventData

Trend2.ChartQuery: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=539 OR EventID=644 OR EventID=4740 OR EventID=6279 OR EventID:[529..537] OR EventID=539 OR EventID=4625 OR EventID=4728 OR EventID=4732 OR EventID=4756 OR EventID=632 OR EventID=636 OR EventID=660 OR EventID=4729 OR EventID=4733 OR EventID=4757 OR EventID=633 OR EventID=637 OR EventID=661 OR EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628] OR EventID=624 OR EventID=630 OR EventID=4726 OR EventID=4720 OR EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 OR EventID=643 OR EventID=4739 OR EventID=612 OR EventID=4719 OR EventID=4670 OR EventID:[608..609] OR EventID:[621..622] OR EventID:[4704..4705] OR EventID=516 OR EventID=4612 OR EventID=517 OR EventID=1102 OR EventID=560 OR EventID=567 OR EventID=4656 OR EventID=4663 OR EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 OR EventID:[4727..4735] OR EventID=4737 OR EventID:[4754..4758] OR EventID:[631..639] OR EventID=641 OR EventID:[658..662] OR EventID=528 OR EventID=540 OR EventID=4624

properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=539 OR EventID=644 OR EventID=4740 OR EventID=6279
Type=SecurityEvent EventID=539 OR EventID=644 OR EventID=4740 OR EventID=6279 | measure count() by EventID
Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[529..537] OR EventID=539 OR (EventID=4625 AND Status=0xc000006d) | Select TargetAccount, IpAddress, Computer, LogonProcessName, AuthenticationPackageName, LogonTypeName

properties.DisplayName: Access Violation: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts (Target Account Count)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID:[529..537] OR EventID=539 OR (EventID=4625 AND Status=0xc000006d) | measure count() by TargetAccount

properties.DisplayName: Account Management: Domain and Built-in Administrators Membership Changes (Member Added)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4728 OR EventID=4732 OR EventID=4756 OR EventID=632 OR EventID=636 OR EventID=660 AND ("*512" OR "S-1-5-32-544") | Extend "Add Member" AS Action | Select Action, TargetUserName, Activity, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated, Computer

properties.DisplayName: Account Management: Domain and Built-in Administrators Membership Changes (Member Removed)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=4729 OR EventID=4733 OR EventID=4757 OR EventID=633 OR EventID=637 OR EventID=661 AND ("*512" OR "S-1-5-32-544") | Extend "Remove Member" AS Action | Select Action, TargetUserName, Activity, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TimeGenerated, Computer

properties.DisplayName: Account Management: Passwords Change Attempts by Non-Owner
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" TargetAccount NOT IN {Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=4723 OR EventID=4724 OR EventID:[627..628]) AND SubjectAccount!="ANONYMOUS LOGON" | measure count() by SubjectAccount} | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS ChangedBy | SelectÂ  TimeGenerated, Computer, TargetAccount, ChangedBy
Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=624 OR EventID=4720) | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS CreatedBy | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, CreatedBy, Computer
Type=SecurityEvent (EventID=630 OR EventID=4726) | EXTEND SubjectAccount AS DeletedBy | Select TimeGenerated, TargetAccount, DeletedBy, Computer

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events For Specified Computer (Detail)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent Computer="<<Computer Name>>"

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events For Specified Computer (Activity)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent Computer="<<Computer Name>>" | measure count() by Activity

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events For Specified User (Details)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent Account="<<User Domain\Account Name>>"

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events For Specified User (Activity)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent Account="<<User Domain\Account Name>>" | measure count() by Activity

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events With Specified Event ID (Details)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID="<<Event Id>>"

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events With Specified Event ID (Computer)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID="<<Event Id>>" | measure count() by Computer

properties.DisplayName: Forensic: All Events With Specified Event ID (Account)
properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID="<<Event Id>>" | measure count() by Account
Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 | measure count() AS Count by Activity
Type=SecurityEvent Computer="<<Computer Name>>" | measure count() by Activity
Type=SecurityEvent Computer="<<Computer Name>>" | measure count() by EventID
Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 | measure count() AS Count by TimeGenerated Interval 1Hour
Type=SecurityEvent EventID!=0 AND EventID:[xx..yy] | measure count() AS Count by Activity Interval 1Hour

properties.Query: Type=SecurityEvent EventID=576 OR EventID=4672 AND SubjectDomainName!="NT AUTHORITY" AND AccountType!="Machine" | Select SubjectAccount, PrivilegeList
